quote: Your purpose is your why.
author: Deborah Day

quote: We make our purpose.
author: Carl Sagan,  The Varieties of Scientific Experience: A Personal View of the Search for God

quote: Your purpose in life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: the purpose of life is the life of purpose
author: Robin S. Sharma,  The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari

quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
author: Robert Bryne

quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
author: Robert Byrne

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: To enjoy the beauty and abundance of life, revitalize your life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The purpose of life is to discover your gift. The meaning of life is to give your gift away.
author: David Viscott

quote: My purpose is: What Lord? Where Lord? When Lord? Yes Lord!
author: Christine Brooks-Martin

quote: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: To enjoy the magic of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The purpose of life is the expansion of happiness.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: To feel the joy of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The purpose of life is to be defeated by greater and greater things.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Education: learning to find your purpose. Upon finding your purpose: what did I learn?
author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: To see the beauty, love
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The most important purpose of education is to learn how to find the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I set out to discover the why of it, and to transform my pleasure into knowledge.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: The purpose that you wish to find in life, like a cure you seek, is not going to fall from the sky. ...I believe purpose is something for which one is responsible; it's not just divinely assigned.
author: Michael J. Fox,  Always Looking Up: The Adventures of an Incurable Optimist

quote: To grow the power of an imagination, travel to see the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Having a sense of purpose is having a sense of self. A course to plot is a destination to hope for.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: To see the magic of life look through the wondrous eyes of a child.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you were all alone in the universe with no one to talk to, no one with which to share the beauty of the stars, to laugh with, to touch, what would be your purpose in life? It is other life; it is love, which gives your life meaning. This is harmony. We must discover the joy of each other, the joy of challenge, the joy of growth.
author: Mitsugi Saotome

quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: It is action that creates motivation.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: To think what is true, to sense what is beautiful and to want what is good, hereby the spirit finds purpose of a life in reason.
author: Johann Gottfried Herder

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: For the human experience, life in the natural world seems to require the application of meaning, in order to evoke purpose.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: The secret to success is constancy of purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: To help humanity, live with kindness and harmony.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To furnish the means of acquiring knowledge is ... the greatest benefit that can be conferred upon mankind. It prolongs life itself and enlarges the sphere of existence.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: What is the purpose of writing? For me personally, it is really to explain the mystery of life, and the mystery of life includes, of course, the personal, the political, the forces that make us what we are while there's another force from inside battling to make us something else.
author: Nadine Gordimer

quote: After a point of time, when you get success and fame, money and everything, the purpose of life has to be redefined. For me, I think that purpose is to build bridges. Artists can do that very easily, more than politicians.
author: A. R. Rahman

quote: Make your work to be in keeping with your purpose
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The only purpose of our lives consists in waking each other up and being there for each other.
author: Johanna Paungger,  Moon Time: The Art of Harmony with Nature and Lunar Cycles

quote: Remember, purpose is about giving...All you can do with your life is to give it away in the service of others.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: The primary purpose of prayer is not to make requests. The primary purpose is to praise, to sing, to chant. Because the essence of prayer is a song, and man cannot live without a song. Prayer may not save us. But prayer may make us worthy of being saved.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel,  Moral Grandeur and Spiritual Audacity: Essays

quote: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: To me, art's highest purpose is to entertain, to enlighten, to inspire, to evoke emotion and to change an audience in some way, big or small.
author: Charity Sunshine Tillemann-Dick

quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: A purpose of human life, no matter who is controlling it, is to love whoever is around to be loved.
author: Kurt Vonnegut,  The Sirens of Titan

quote: Money. The ultimate motivation. The ultimate way of keeping score.
author: Michael Connelly,  Chasing the Dime

quote: I am serving the purpose for which I was designed, therefore I am satisfied with my existence.
author: Kevin J. Anderson

quote: Boredom: the desire for desires.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Each of our acts makes a statement as to our purpose.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: To find a focus, learn to love and dream.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything in life had a purpose, and unless it achieved that purpose, it was just taking up space on the planet and wasting everybody's time.
author: Jeannette Walls,  Half Broke Horses

quote: The purpose of life is not to be happyâ€”but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you lived at all.
author: Leo Rosten
